forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
